channel.title: Elite Pking change server ip?
channel.description:
Hey guys, I need help with this client. I want to host Elite Pking (http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,415201.msg3055890.html#msg3055890), however the client wont let any1 else on For example, i activated the source, and i was playing the game, then i asked my friend to download the client, but he wasnt allowed on. So we tried to fix it by opening the gui.java file, and changing the server ip to my ip (it was initially on 0.0.0.0) can anyone help me??????
P.S. should i be changing it to my apples1.no-biz???

item.title: Elite Pking change server ip?
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Whip Mod Whip
item.description:
@Mod_Whip wrote:

you should just be able to change the ip, save, compile, and run and it’ll work. Make sure you’ve portforwareded (lol odd word) and stuff

Read full topic

do u know how to fix it?

item.title: Elite Pking change server ip?
item.dc:creator: @chocothunda chocothunda
item.description:
@chocothunda wrote:

  1. I wouldn’t give away your IP address on here.
  2. You probably haven’t portfowarded.
